Public Class SearchIndexingBufferedSender(Of T) Implements IAsyncDisposable, IDisposable
type SearchIndexingBufferedSender<'T> = class interface IDisposable interface IAsyncDisposable

Docs.typeparam: The .NET type that maps to the index schema. Instances of this type can be retrieved as documents from the index. You can use for dynamic documents.
Docs.summary: Index search documents with intelligent batching, automatic flushing, and retries for failed indexing actions.

Docs.param: The SearchClient used to send requests to the service.
The to customize the sender's behavior.
Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of that can be used to index search documents with intelligent batching, automatic flushing, and retries for failed indexing actions.

Docs.summary: Gets the URI endpoint of the Search Service. This is likely to be similar to "https://{search_service}.search.windows.net".
Docs.remarks: This is not the URI of the Search Index. You could construct that URI with "{Endpoint}/indexes/{IndexName}" if needed.
